fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player each night to hypnotize. The hypnotized player will see "You were hypnotized last night!" in their messages, and will be unable to vote that day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only hypnotize one player per night.
- You cannot hypnotize players two nights in a row.
- Made by AI, unique beacuse the name started with "The".

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the town win the game.
